meanings.definition: A shrewd, unscrupulous person, especially a small-time moneylender or trader.
meanings.sent1: The gombeen tricked the villagers into unfair deals.
meanings.sent2: The gombeen always found a way to make a profit, no matter the cost.
meanings.sent3: The gombeen's sly smile hinted at his next cunning scheme.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as a gombeen, preying on the vulnerable like a vulture.
meanings.sent5: The gombeen's reputation for deceit spread throughout the town.

meanings.definition: A person who profits from the misfortunes of others.
meanings.sent1: The gombeen took advantage of the poor during hard times.
meanings.sent2: Being a gombeen meant thriving on the struggles of those around you.
meanings.sent3: The gombeen's pockets grew fat as others suffered losses.
meanings.sent4: She despised the gombeen for profiting off the misery of the community.
meanings.sent5: The gombeen's wealth was built on the backs of the unfortunate.

meanings.sent4: They accused him of trying to gombeen his competitors out of business.
